search_04_001/4301_0701_0200_10: This whole area is made from real volcanic rock.
search_04_001/4301_0701_0300_10:
Word is there are some precious stones being
found out here lately.
search_04_001/4301_0701_0400_10:
I’ve heard we can take whatever stones we want
from here, so what do you think? Wanna have a
look around?
search_04_001/4301_0401_0600_10: I knew you would want to!
search_04_001/4301_0402_0800_10: Ahaha! You’re all ready to go, aren’t you?
search_04_001/4301_0701_0900_10:
It’s pretty straightforward. Just smash some rocks
that you find lying around and see what kind of
stones are inside.
search_04_001/4301_0701_1000_10: Let’s see which one of us can find the most!
